values.value: Lead.CreatedDate >= [yyyy]-[MM]-[dd-1]T00:00:00+07:00 AND Lead.CreatedDate <= [yyyy]-[MM]-[dd-1]T23:59:59+07:00 AND Lead.RTL_Contact_Method__c not in ('Call Me Now','Call Me Later') AND (Lead.LeadSource IN ('Website','ATM','Touch') AND Lead.Owner.Id = '00G900000030GlP') AND Lead.RTL_Product_Name__c IN ('Cash2Go','Flash PLUS','Credit Card','Credit Cards' ,'So Fast','So Smart','So Chill','Top Brass','Other Credit Card','TMB VISA SIGNATURE' ,'Home Loan','Refinance Home Loan','Home Equity','Easy Saver 15/9 (Par)' ,'Happy Retire 90 (Enhance Death Benefit)','Pay Light High Protect 20/10','The Treasure' ,'Payroll','Protection Gap','Easy Care Plan 1','PA Prestige (Silver)','PA CI (PA and health)','Happy life protect 99/10 (PAR)','Flexi Care 7.5 mn','CI Prompt Care Plan1','Payroll_Secure', 'Payroll_BA', 'Payroll_Investment', 'Payroll_Unsecure','BA tax campaign','BenefitPlus (HL)','BenefitPlus (HE)','BenefitPlus (Unsecured Loan)','GBHCC','GBHFC') AND Lead.RecordType.DeveloperName IN ('Retail_Banking','Retail_Closed_Lost') AND Lead.Id != null AND Lead.FirstName != NULL
